model.status



class Status;
A magical status, affecting living unit.

immutable long id;
Returns:
the unique status Id.

immutable StatusType type;
Returns:
the status type.

immutable long wizardId;
Returns:
the Id of the wizard casted this status or 
-1
.

immutable long playerId;
Returns:
the Id of the player, which unit casted this status, or 
-1
.

immutable int remainingDurationTicks;
Returns:
the remaining status duration.
